AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Subtitle: From full-stack dev to parachutist artilleryman
AboutMe.Citation: My journey is as diverse as my passions

Passions.Title: My passions
Passions.Description: I am a technology enthusiast with a great affection for computer hardware. When I'm not coding, you can find me painting miniature figurines, capturing moments with analog photography, or working at music festivals. I am a metal music fan, an avid gamer, and someone who loves exploring new interests. My curiosity knows no bounds, and I love learning and discovering new things
